user.title: Set Up BOM Australia
user.description:
Enter your location to find the nearest Bureau of Meteorology weather station.

By default, your Home Assistant location is used. Alternatively, you can check the box below to search by Australian postcode instead.

weather_name.title: Configure Entity Prefix
weather_name.description:
Nearest BOM location: {location_name}
Observation station: {station_name} (ID: {station_id})

Choose a prefix for all your BOM entities (weather, sensors, and warnings).
Example with prefix '{default_prefix}':
  • weather.{default_prefix}
  • sensor.{default_prefix}_temp
  • binary_sensor.{default_prefix}_warning_flood

sensors_create.title: Select Sensor Types
sensors_create.description: Choose which types of sensors you would like to create.

observations_monitored.title: Observational Sensors
observations_monitored.description: Choose which observational sensors you would like to create.

warnings_monitored.title: Warning Sensors
warnings_monitored.description: Choose which warning types you would like to monitor. Each selected warning will create a binary sensor that turns on when an active warning is issued.

forecasts_monitored.title: Forecast Sensors
forecasts_monitored.description: Choose which forecast sensors you would like to create and how many days of forecasts to generate (0-7).
